verses.roman:
ghare āsi' rātrye bhaṭṭa cintite lāgila
"pūrve prayāge more mahā-kṛpā kaila

synonyms: ghare āsi'-coming home; rātrye—at night; bhaṭṭa—Vallabha Bhaṭṭa; cintite lāgila—began to think; pūrve—previously; prayāge—at Prayāga; more—unto me; mahā-kṛpā kaila—showed great mercy.
translation: Returning home that night, Vallabha Bhaṭṭa thought, "Previously, at Prayāga, Lord Caitanya was very kind to me.
